Package Manual.services

Class RepositoryService

java.lang.Object
Manual.services.BaseService<Repository,​Long,​RepositoryRepo>
Manual.services.RepositoryService
public class RepositoryService extends BaseService<Repository,​Long,​RepositoryRepo>
Class that models from RepositoryDTO using RepositoryMapper to be intermediary between the RepositoryController and the database
Author:
sps169, FedericoTB
